alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:08AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tazewell, Greenbrier, Summers, Mercer and Monroe Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1208 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bradley to near Boissevain. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Princeton... Lewisburg... Hinton... White Sulphur Springs... Ronceverte... Rainelle... and Alderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
